New Records: Anthony Davis scored 31 points and 14 rebounds, reaching the 30-point plateau for the eighth time in 12 games this season.
Dalton Knecht set a career-high with 27 points and made five 3-pointers.
Key Match Events: LeBron James made two pivotal 3-pointers in the final minutes to turn the game in favor of the Lakers.
The Lakers outscored the Pelicans in the paint, 52-40.
Pre-Game Insights: Cam Reddish did not play due to a lower right leg injury.
Post-Match Reflections: The Lakers extended their winning streak to five games with the victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was part of the NBA Cup, adding context to its importance.
